channel.title: 2.2.6 DevOps on 计算机学习笔记
channel.description: Recent content in 2.2.6 DevOps on 计算机学习笔记

item.title: Terraform
item.description: Terraform # hashicorp/terraform Terraform enables you to safely and predictably create, change, and improve infrastructure. It is an open source tool that codifies APIs into declarative configuration files that can be shared amongst team members, treated as code, edited, reviewed, and versioned. https://www.terraform.io/

item.title: Ansible
item.description: Ansible # ansible/ansible Ansible is a radically simple IT automation platform that makes your applications and systems easier to deploy and maintain. Automate everything from code deployment to network configuration to cloud management, in a language that approaches plain English, using SSH, with no agents to install on remote systems.

item.title: Packer
item.description: Packer # hashicorp/packer Packer is a tool for creating identical machine images for multiple platforms from a single source configuration. http://www.packer.io/

item.title: Chef
item.description: Chef # chef/chef Chef Infra, a powerful automation platform that transforms infrastructure into code automating how infrastructure is configured, deployed and managed across any environment, at any scale http://www.chef.io/chef/

item.title: Jenkins
item.description: Jenkins # jenkinsci/jenkins Jenkins automation server https://www.jenkins.io/

item.title: Pulumi
item.description: Pulumi # pulumi/pulumi Pulumi - Modern Infrastructure as Code. Any cloud, any language https://www.pulumi.com/

item.title: Puppet
item.description: Puppet # puppetlabs/puppet Server automation framework and application https://puppet.com/open-source/#osp

item.title: SaltStack
item.description: SaltStack # saltstack/salt Software to automate the management and configuration of any infrastructure or application at scale. Get access to the Salt software package repository here: https://repo.saltstack.com/
